website_summaries.verdict: The Apple TV 4K is perfect for casual users and home theater buffs. It delivers stunning audio and video and provides a best-in-class user experience.
pros: It’s super simple to set up, and includes both Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos to deliver truly cinematic experiences
Airplay capability allows you to stream music, videos, games, and just about anything from any Apple device in your home
cons: This streaming device is a bit on the pricy side

customer_reviews.title: Yay, no more buffering!
customer_reviews.text: We own about 3 different models of Rokus and an Amazon Fire. They all suffer from the same malady -- constant buffering. This will make you want to yank it out of the wall and toss it out the window during a critical football game or the best part of your favorite show. The Apple TV blows them away IMO. It is extremely fast and no more buffering issues. Certainly pricier than other options, but well worth saving up your pennies to get this!
customer_reviews.author: David Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Best streaming device yet!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best apple tv yet. The picture is unbelievably clear (and I don't even have a 4K TV). Really, really easy to set up. It links to your iPhone or iPad so you can use it to type in passwords etc during setup. I also have several Roku boxes and am now back to Apple TV - much better than ever!
customer_reviews.author: TexasGirl

customer_reviews.title: The remote is glass and breaks almost instantly. It's nearly $60 to replace it.
customer_reviews.text: The AppleTV is fine, but the remote is a nightmare and makes the whole product unsatisfactory. The remote is tiny and the touchscreen is nearly impossible to use and it breaks if you even tilt it when placing it on your coffee table (as I did). The photo I've attached shows the remote taped up because of broken glass. Still trying to decide what to replace it with as my return window on the product has passed.
customer_reviews.author: Billy24

customer_reviews.title: I have a smart tv. I already had the functionality to watch ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a smart tv. I already had the functionality to watch Netflix and Amazon Prime shows, but hated how long it took for my tv to "boot up" and connect to actually watch my shows. This felt like a lot of money to save myself the 30 seconds it took for my tv to connect, but I own other Apple products and thought that the integration would *somewhat* justify the cost. Now that I'm on the other side? I don't know how I lived without this thing. Immediate bootup, access to my digital library, I can even control my soundbar with the remote! This took ALL of the frustration out of using my so-called smart tv.
customer_reviews.author: PNWashington

customer_reviews.title: Remote is terrible and box is a pain
customer_reviews.text: The remote has a mind of its own and only works every once in a while. I have to constantly go back and unplug the box and then constantly keep the remote plugged in for it to actually work while I'm watching my shoes. It VERY VERY FRUSTRATING!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: Constantly requires disconnecting and reconnecting a cable to reboot.
customer_reviews.text: The device constantly shuts down and can not be restarted until I disconnect and reconnect either the power cable or the hdmi cable.
customer_reviews.author: Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Can't praise this enough - buy it
customer_reviews.text: Apple really hit it out of the park with this one. I can't find a single fault with it. The remote is fantastic. Very small, but very comfortable and easy to use. Love the Siri support directly from the remote. Picture and audio quality are equally as good. I have an Nvidia Shield as well, but the Apple TV is noticeably better in both the visuals and audio (when connected to a 4K HDR compatible TV). Especially when playing music, there's no comparison between the two. HDMI CEC support is present as well, so you can turn on and off your TV directly from the Apple TV's remote. Truly an excellent product, wish I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Bananas

customer_reviews.title: not as  good as  the  old one  not  even  close to  , it has slowed down t he system
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to get better speed an image than the one Igot directly with the smart tv, but it has been the oposite, really slowed down the system, and applications like netflix take 5 minutes to download , see attached that si the tv for several minutes before getting any image !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mariacata

customer_reviews.title: Out of warranty per Apple customer service
customer_reviews.text: Per Apple these devices have over a year of use on them and are most likely refurbished and not simple returns within a short time period as typical warehouse deals. Again, NO WARRANTY is available per Apple. Needless to say I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ann

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy the latest Apple TV unit
customer_reviews.text: I have been an Apple user for many years. Since the first iPhone came out I have bought no other brand....until now!! This is the WORST version of Apple TV that I have owned!!! I WANT MY OLD UNIT BACK!!! It won’t stay connected! I don’t have any problems with wifi with any other device in my house and there are several! Even when I’m the only one home and using the internet it constantly disconnects!!! So frustrating!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mimifor2

customer_reviews.title: 100% Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This product is so simple to setup, use, and navigate. I have never had it buffer, but I also have a wired internet connection for it so I can not speak on behalf of the wifi connection. If you have another apple product, it instantly syncs to that so you don't have to sign in and makes the setup process so simple. The Siri on the remote is what I was most skeptical about, but works surprisingly amazing. I use it every day and it has never misunderstood me. The picture quality is beautiful and have not ever seen the quality fluctuate. This thing is great! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Stokes

customer_reviews.title: already loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in the exact same way as I expected from Apple!!! The quality is sharp & I can definitely see the difference in the 4K one vs 1080p from last year! I think this is worth buying & upgrading from last years model especially if you have a 4K TV!
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: The remote SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: Works well but the remote is terrible. It’s small, slippery and sensitive to any touch. Place it face down and it cancels the show. The cat steps on it and fast forwards it. Pick it up and it pauses. Leave it on the couch and it’s gone between the cushions. Any contact on that glass panel interrupts what you’re watching. If you have adult sized hands, forget it. The same designers who put tiny buttons on phones must have made this. It’s certainly cute and probably won some design award somewhere, but functionally it is crap.
customer_reviews.author: DWT

customer_reviews.title: Failed Slightly Over 1 Year Mark
customer_reviews.text: I also had a pretty constant need to reboot the Apple TV due to technical issues... It didn't handle my library properly... and after many hours of usage, it could become a bit flaky. Really dislike the warrantee I was offered and have yet to be able to even place a claim despite Square Trade being on the hook for a three year period... They will do whatever they can do to put roadblocks both via process and technology in your way to avoid paying anything... at least that has been my experience.
customer_reviews.author: William S. Ott

customer_reviews.title: Faulty device out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Setup did not recognize being connected thru the Ethernet cable to the Internet, failed to be configured thru iPhone X, did not recognize listed WiFi 5 GHZ network. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Like most things Apple... nicely designed with a TERRIBLE remote.
customer_reviews.text: The interface of the Apple TV is bettter than most any I've seen. It's responsive, nicely laid out and loaded with potential from the App Store. However, like most things Apple... they have one (or two) glaring flaws. For the Apple TV it's the remote. It's TERRIBLE and very poorly thought out. It's tiny and gets lost easily. It also is way too finicky. Sometimes it swipes fine... others not at all. You'll end up pausing things when you didn't want to and kicking yourself out of the app you're watching without even noticing. It's terrible. Use your phone if you have an iPhone otherwise you'll be very frustrated... A LOT.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Michel

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp learning curve....
customer_reviews.text: All the previous negative comments written about this device are so, so true. The remote is sketchy at best. The device took 30 minutes after plugging in and turning on to play any program due to the frequent requests to input IDs and passwords, over, and over, and over. Even though I know and use Apple products, this is so difficult to figure out. So unlike Macs and Mac Books. It is not intuitive. It is not easy to understand. There are virtually no instructions to learn how the device works. I had to ask web questions and visit numerous sites online to get to my Netflix acct. Shame on you, Apple.
customer_reviews.author: slpdogwalker

customer_reviews.title: Worst remote control EVER
customer_reviews.text: I had to go through my purchases to find this device and warn people about this awful remote!!! Seriously Apple, you owe me for all the time trying to make this thing work. I want to be CLEAR: the actual receiver itself, quality etc is all good, although I bought this at the same time as a the Amazon Fire stick 4K and highly recommend that one. But the remote!!!! Omg this thing is constant frustration! Only way to work it is install the remote app on your phone and then it works, but actual remote they sent is garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Chocjedi

customer_reviews.title: the remote from hell
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst tech experience I've ever had. I note another review that called the remote "the spawn of Satan", but that was a huge understatement. It is completely dysfunctional. After putting over an hour and a half into just setup I gave up and sent it back. Apple TV's earlier remote was not broken so they should not have "fixed" it. What a nightmare. I'm going to see if I can find one of the earlier versions of Apple TV, from back when it actually worked.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Needing to be Rebooted
customer_reviews.text: Every time I shut the TV off for a couple hours and then turn it back on, the Apple TV needs to be rebooted. Looking online, this appears to be a problem that several people have been having. Apple needs to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lanning Smith

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time and the 4K is great. I use Infuse app to watch my CD’s ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time and the 4K is great. I use Infuse app to watch my CD’s I have dignified and even the older SD movies look better than I have ever seen them and now rewatching my older movies and finding things I missed, so the up conversions to my 55 inch 4K TV is a great experience. Hulu, Netscape, Prime Video and CBS unlimited, and the many other apps are great. I love the way the YouTube works, and I pick what I want to watch on my IPAD and it starts playing on my 55 inch screen. Great for music videos, Ted Talks, and I guess cat videos.
customer_reviews.author: Jshrimp

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed in this product. Perhaps I had higher expectations and not a full understanding of how this actually works. Had I know that my new iPad would mirror by using AirDrop I could have saved the cost of this item. If you are not electronically savvy - buyer beware. The Siri assistance is good but I don't particularly care for the 'swipe' to move around on the screen. Not a teenager so that may be considered a handicap!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CristCross

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade was a mistake
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from an earlier generation - perhaps 2 - and it was a huge mistake. The 4 is not noticeably faster. The new interface is clunky beyond words and user-unfriendly. The remote is not usable - you will want a third party remote, and hope it has all the functions you need. (I’m still trying to figure out how to rewind and fast forward with my third party remote.). A complicated, clunky interface and an unusable remote are a bad combination. Given all the above, the gen 4 is about 4 times slower to use than the previous model I was using, and so frustrating to use that I tend to just read a book instead.
customer_reviews.author: patriot1123

customer_reviews.title: Apple TV+ a scam
customer_reviews.text: Bought this new Apple TV in part because of the inclusion and hype of Apple TV plus($60 of its value). Practically ever show I click on I have to pay for, only a couple seem to be included in Apple TV+. There is no indication of which shows are included and which aren’t. It’s an awful game of bait and switch.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian B Becker

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy. Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I’ve always been a fan of Apple products but this one tops the charts TV has a way better picture the audio is Clear. And I like I can put all my streaming services on one device that also controls the volume on my sound bar and turns my TV on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Costs more, has fewer options, causes display problems
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn’t for needing this in order to watch Apple TV+ shows, we’d have returned it right away. We also have Chromecasts, FireTVs and a Roku, which all are less expensive, work better and have more app options. The most annoying thing with the Apple TV is that whenever you switch from the Apple TV HDMI input to one of the other HDMI inputs, the screen resolution and color gets all messed up. This is a well-known issue on the Apple forums that still hasn’t been fixed. The workaround is to switch to the HDMI port you want and then turn the TV on and off, which seems to reset the video so it displays properly.
customer_reviews.author: EdG0000

customer_reviews.title: Love this if you are an apple home
customer_reviews.text: If you have an iPad, iPhone, Mac, mirror to this is so effortless. I carry one around to use for business as the company I work for is heavily iPad based. Anyone in the room can screen mirror up without any cables or attachments. It is so clean and effortless, I love it. Most of my customers now have one in every conference room. Please note, Amazon is not an authorized business reseller for Apple so it can make larger scale commercial registration a challenge. To get around this, go to an actual Apple store in your area and buy something, anything, and ask them for their Apple Reseller ID. Use that.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: REMOTE STOPPED WORKING!
customer_reviews.text: 4th time using and the remote wont work. tried all the reset/syncing instructions. $50 replacement for remote!!!!! horriblee
customer_reviews.author: Alex E Siedlecki

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful picture and great sound when you get it to work......doesn't work well with the Harmony Ultra, the remote is the most useless unresponsive thing I have ever used! Is Apple going to start cranking out junk now, looks like that is a possibility. Not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if it was worth the $
customer_reviews.text: The remote is absurdly small. The touch screen is a pain to use. You need to change video settings with some sources to avoid stutter with fast motion. Better to let the 4k tv upscale. You cannot rent movies on the apple tv through vudu, amazon, etc., you can only purchase. Reason, apple is not getting $ from you for a rental. I purchased this because I "cut the cable" for hulu. There are other, less expensive options than apple
customer_reviews.author: yohjo

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My apple TV is constantly having problems with the apps. I need to reinstall apps like Youtube, VUDU & Netflix every week or two because they simply stops working or responding. This is annoying. I have a Roku in another room that was half the price and never has had a problem. The remote is also annoying. It's small and the touch pad on it causes unwanted selections pretty much every time it's used. Not a nice experience. I do like the style of the unit and the interface is nice but it hardly makes up for the overall experience. I regret the purchase and wish I had just got another Roku.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Used unit out of warranty.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of the "Used - Acceptable" units thinking I could save some money, but I will be returning it because it is completely out of warranty, which means the unit is over one year old (Apple's warranty is 1 year). I know this because I entered the serial number in the "checkcoverage.apple.com" website. The unit in itself is great. Apple TV 4K has a great picture and it's very user-friendly. Siri voice control is excellent. The used units are about $135. Spend the extra bit $40 and get a brand new one with a 1 year warranty. They might "test" the used ones, but then again, it's electronics and they can go bad at any moment.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I’m a fan of this device
customer_reviews.text: This device is fast and the video output is fantastic. The remote has simple Clear functions for manual use. Or, press the mike button and tell it to open Prime, Hulu, or Netflix (after you set them up). It did not arrive out of the box with an iOS capable of supporting NetFlix. But, process to update to an iOS that does was quick and simple. Performance is a function of bandwidth. This device works great with high bandwidth. It might be okay with low bandwidth but you’ll need to keep reading reviews if that’s what you are looking for. I like the sleek smith compact look of the device as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best streamer on the market
customer_reviews.text: I came from a Roku 4k, but was disappointed by the compatibility with my LG OLED TV and lack of Atmos. I bought the Apple TV as soon as I heard they were adding Atmos. I downloaded tv OS 12 and the Apple TV now blows away the Roku. Finally, streaming Dolby Atmos combined with 4k HDR is possible. And it works. Playback, FFWD, REW, all are super smooth and perfect quality. There's a reason the Apple products cost more. You should know, though, that I'm not generally an Apple fan. All phones and tablets in my house have been Androids for the last 7 years.
customer_reviews.author: SW Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Blows Android tv, roku and fire tv out of the water
customer_reviews.text: Had Roku and android tv. I stopped being cheap and paid the premium for Apple tv and don't regret it. It's just miles better in interface, video quality, audio quality if you're using a surround system. The voice recognition and search is awesome and I love the small remote. You get what you pay for and Apple tv is more expensive and a lot better than the competition
customer_reviews.author: Philippe Villard

customer_reviews.title: Great Device, but remote could be much better.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is clearly much better, and the device works wonderfully, there is a very clear difference in resolution between the 4K model and prior models. My only issue is the remote, the remote is very finicky, sensitive and difficult to use. I wish they would put analog buttons on the remote instead of just the sensor strip.
customer_reviews.author: Detroit Lion Family

customer_reviews.title: Love This! All in one!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I have everything where I need it! I have Hulu, Amazon prime videos, netflix, all my music apps, Multiple movie/tv apps! This was so worth the purchase. My only negative thing to say is that it did not come with an HDMI cable... so I had to go out and buy one before using. Extremely easy to install. I have not used the voice thing yet. Setting it up super easy. Remote takes a little getting use to, but once you figure it out piece of cake! W/ that being said think I'll be getting more for all my other tv's!
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2009 Samsung TV and it interfaces well with it. It's easy to set up, easy to use. I love being able to search by voice instead of the tedious hunt and peck that most search programs require. I have had very little problem with it recognizing what I was saying, even with a Covid mask on. I get Disney +, Netflix and Amazon Prime with no problem .I thought it was a bit expensive at first but after using it for a while my opinion changed. You usually get what you pay for and this was worth the money. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Apple TV, why did I ever leave you?
customer_reviews.text: When my old apple tv died last summer, we bought a Roku stick. Long story short, it has been a regret from day one. Fast forward to a couple of weeks ago when we learned that Roku wouldn’t support all the content on HBO Max, and that was the final straw. The Apple TV 4K has only been here half a day and we’re already asking ourselves why we ever strayed. Apple TV, so glad to be back!
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre C Schaneman

customer_reviews.title: Buy this and not a Fire Stick 4 K
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. After a fire stick this is heaven! No more buffering. No more subscriptions to YouTube videos on how to get. Your Amazon Fire Stick to work. Total pleasure. Spend the money for this, the Fire stick is a total piece of crap. I have one left. Just had to pair the remote for the millionth time with Fire Stick. The Apple pairs the remote and the TV for you
customer_reviews.author: Dave and Gayle

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 best streamer from a man who’s tried them all
customer_reviews.text: Leaps and bounds above amazon Fire sticks and any other top set devices. Absolute beast of a streaming device with almost no lag (dependent on the Internet speed). Definitely worth the price! And if you are fully immersed in the Apple ecosystem it’s amazing how everything just works together, from having a spare remote on your wrist with the Apple Watch to being able to cast instantly almost anything via AirPlay.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Good system, but the remote is not very user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than what we were using before, but still needs some work. First, the remote is too small and too slick to the touch. Bought a soft plastic case from Amazon which helps, but the remote remains somewhat limited. The Siri voice works better than we had been told by others, which is quite helpful since to maneuver around the Apple TV site takes some getting used to. For example, to resume a movie or show where you previously left off, is not very easy using the remote - but asking Siri works much better. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Had the 2nd generation for several years, don't know why it took me so long to upgrade to the 4k. The difference is night and day. Glad I finally made the move. The voice recognition remote is a big plus, Picture quality is superior, the ability to download all types of different apps is great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Special Edition

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: Every time you exit an application now, it forces you into an intermediate screen that tries to guide your "content selection strategy" rather that going back to the mains screen - Basically slows down your navigation. This unit has problem with "average HDMI" cables which manifests as an intermittent lag with the performance of the remote control. Apple, if you need to upgrade the specs of your HW to get decent performance out of your products, try moving down from 500 to a 400% profit.
customer_reviews.author: Striker Fired

customer_reviews.title: Great Apple product!
customer_reviews.text: WTH is with the negative feedback? I just received mine 64GB model and it’s already been through hours of streaming live tv and some recorded shows. It’s great that you can setup you iPhone as a remote. It’s one of apple’s devices so we all know it’s going to be of great quality and so far it’s lives up to its game. I don’t know why there are any negative reviews and the remote control is not possessed like someone had indicated. It works perfectly and if you don’t like to use the remote that it came with then use you phone as a remote. Simple as that!
customer_reviews.author: Gqsmooth1981

customer_reviews.title: I feel a bit dirty for allowing this
customer_reviews.text: I feel a bit dirty for allowing this, my first apple product, into my house. I bought it specifically for use with Zwift Cycling, and it's pretty awesome for that. I'm sure if you already have accepted apple as your savior the setup will be a lot easier. I do have to admit the screen saver is better than my Nvidia Shield TV, but I think it's only because of the animation. The remote sucks, and I think that is no secret, but there's even an Android app for that, so you can use the Apple TV remote as intended-for propping up that one wobbly leg of a restaurant table.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Huntzinger

customer_reviews.title: Very OVERPRICED material. Better value at Netflix and Redbox
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this thing will send you to the poor house with the prices they want for some of the very old movies as well as new and other material. I prefer Netflix and Redbox to this thing all day long. Much better value and pricing. Too bad I'm hooked to a year subscription now.
customer_reviews.author: Reader1

customer_reviews.title: but the native resolution is still amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased as my gen 2 Apple TV was on it's last leg. I continue to be impressed with the ease of installation. Apple allows you to hook up another iOS device via bluetooth and instantly transfer the configurations to the new device. I used configurations from another 4th Gen Apple TV and was literally set up and running strong within about 5 minutes. I continue to use this product daily. While I can't speak to the 4k resolution (don't have a 4k TV, yet :D), but the native resolution is still amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed with the remote.
customer_reviews.text: I hate the remote. Apple really dropped the ball on this one. The trackpad is too sensitive and the logic of which button to use when eludes me. I’ve finally figured it out, but it’s just not “Apple” to me. Lastly, there is not enough tactile distinction between the touchpad and the rest of the remote. In low light situations, I can’t tell which way I’m holding it and wind up trying to use the wrong buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Scottinkga

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Remote
customer_reviews.text: We had the previous generation Apple TV and thought this would be an upgrade. The touchpad is unusable. It is sensitive in ways that cause you to select the wrong thing, and insensitive when you try to click the thing you want. I miss our old remote.
customer_reviews.author: R. Prescott

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: The only good Thing about the new remote is that it’s rechargeable. The touchpad is either too sensitive, or not sensitive enough, and the click feature is set too heavy. Apple TV’s new interface is a squirrelly trainwreck. The cursor is always in the wrong place, and it’s difficult to control. It’s nothing short of frustrating. Sacrificing picture quality for easy to use features Seems counter intuitive, but I think I’m going back to my old Apple TV. Two thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: SevenSymbols

customer_reviews.title: It's an Apple product
customer_reviews.text: This is really not that different from a Roku player or any of the other "players" out there with one exception, it is an Apple product. What does this mean? It means it was super easy to install (once I realized the remote clicked like a mouse on the tap half) and rapidly set itself up to work with numerous streaming media access sites that I have. It is super smooth and crystal clear with no buffering lag issues that I have experienced with previous devices. Highly recommend to consolidate your streaming catalogs and sites.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Apple TV 4K - 32GB - Latest Model)
customer_reviews.text: This devise replaces an older first model which was becoming increasingly more difficult to select programs. New Apple TV 4K works as advertised. Bonus - Apple sent an email to me two weeks after purchase informing me that I'm getting one years of Apple TV with out charge (normally $4.99/month). So that's an additional $59.88 savings on top of the $20 savings for purchasing it on Amazon instead of the Apple store.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Tandberg

customer_reviews.title: Annoying remote drags down my rating
customer_reviews.text: Not bad except for annoying remote. I have been testing it out for the last month as an alternative to a Roku premier plus, which I have had for several years. If I was going to own this thing long-term I would get another remote to replace the Apple one. The remote has no mute button on it which has also annoying. I much prefer the Roku. In every way it is better. Better interface, better remote, better user experience.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: If you like to watch content from your IPhone on TV, the Apple TV is a must.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned IPhones for years. I wish I had purchased an Apple TV years ago too. It makes it very easy to watch content from my phone on the TV screen. I had an Amazon fire stick which was pretty good, but in terms of watching my daughter’s recital videos or other media from my iPhone, the Apple TV wins hands down. Just watch the video on my iPhone and push the Apple TV button and it is on the TV. It is as easy as that. Being a long time IPhone owner the Apple TV is a must. Particularly if you like watching content from your IPhone on a TV.
customer_reviews.author: NY Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Premium TV streaming device
customer_reviews.text: 32 GB seems to be plenty for running all the apps your heart desires. I don’t feel the need to download movies, just stream them. Definitely worth the extra money over other brands. Especially if you’re about the Apple ecosystem in your home with HomeKit. Siri works great. Access to the Apple App Store as well as iTunes Store! Very easy and intuitive setup with all the latest 4K video resolutions. Great range with Bluetooth Remote that re-charges with your iPhone lightning cord and can be programmed easily to control volume of your TV or stereo too! Just can’t say enough about it. Justified in costing a bit more than Roku, Firestick and all the others. Alexa who??
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: Best Apple TV out there
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Apple TV I been a fire tv user for 2 years and I upgraded to the Apple TV for better quality and do to I own all my movies on Apple TV and best purchase that I did
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Maybe great for Apple users but not so-much for the rest of us
customer_reviews.text: If you are an Apple phone user you might like this more than I did ( an Android user who has never owned an Apple phone or computer). I bought it because it has Dolby Vision and wanted more apps. This streamer is definitely geared toward those who are Apple users. I found the whole user experience very frustrating and not very user friendly. In the end the Dolby Vision was not enough to off-set the overall user experience. I have an LG OLED smart-TV that produces the same quality Dolby Vision picture but will have to wait until they add more apps. Maybe great for Apple users but not so-much for the rest of us.
customer_reviews.author: Grizly8745

customer_reviews.title: It's an Apple TV what's not to love except the remote
customer_reviews.text: Just like it says in a tagline everything about this little box is great except the remote. The remote is entirely too small even for a child's hand. Second problem remote the touch interface is way too sensitive. Third problem with the remote the battery life is horrific they need to work on that. Other than issues with the remote everything else about it is typical Apple TV A-OK.
customer_reviews.author: Keon B. Billings

customer_reviews.title: Will turn itself and tv on by itself.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a couple of months but will not stay in sleep mode. Turns itself and the TV on by itself after being put in sleep mode. Have had to unplug power cable lately to get it and the TV to stay off. Becoming a real aggravation. Not like Apple at all. Will likely go back to Roku if I cannot resolve this. Roku is cheaper and does not have nagging problems like this.
customer_reviews.author: RCW

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup Easy to use Remote on my phone is better than the included remote Setting up multiple apple TVs is cool so they have the same interface and settings 4K looks really crisp Works perfectly like most apple products Hbo max app acted up. Could not log in after my brother used his appleID to watch some shows while visiting. Had to log in again with my brothers ID, then log out of my account, then back in and things went back To working as normal. This seems like an ID with HBO Max but it messed with my appleID password so figured it was worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Another great Apple product! - Update 4/3/2020
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a month ago for the new house. The set up was a piece of cake. Less than 3 or 4 minutes to set it up. The picture quality of my new 4k TV is amazing. The interface and the remote are extremely easy to use and understand. A few days ago, as I was playing around on my iPhone, I noticed a new feature added automatically and that is the remote for Apple TV. The interface on the phone is even easier and nicer than the actual remote control. I am loving this product and use it daily. 4/2/202 Update - I loved this so much, I bought a second one for the family room.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ghaemi

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal New Apple TV
customer_reviews.text: Just got new Samsung QTV 4K model and only want the best for AppleTV regardless of the TV coming with these apps. I've had AppleTV since the first generation and I'm not stopping now. It automatically brought up any of my apps the shows that are in 4K/UHD, etc, and the picture/sound is brilliant. It took 3 minutes to hook up and renew the settings. I have been using Apple products for some time now, so that might be why, but it's easy. My tip, however--always hardwire to ethernet cables. God forbid wifi slows down, you do not want to suffer thru any SLOWDOWN. THE BEST APPLETV
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stack

customer_reviews.title: I definitely needed an upgrade from 2nd Generation Apple TV
customer_reviews.text: I had 2nd Generation Apple TV and I had a problem with buffering midway through shows on cable - I had to start all over again and fast forward to the point where the buffering began. I was not sure if the problem was my tv, my cable or the Apple TV. They did not have much advice to provide at the Apple Store, so I took a chance and upgraded to this version. It works fine now! I like the voice control feature - no more hunt and pecking to enter search titles.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Mike

customer_reviews.title: Apple user heaven
customer_reviews.text: I love it. If you’re a heavy Apple user then this is perfect for you. The remote is great and the interface looks smooth. It’s very uncluttered compared to the fire stick. You also get HBO free for a year. Definitely a must buy if you love Apple products
customer_reviews.author: Randy Nukuna

customer_reviews.title: My second Apple TV - great device, not great remote
customer_reviews.text: We are an Apple household - iphones, Macs and Apple TV for quite some time. The user interface and all that is much better than before - I think I had a second gen one prior. I really dig how I can customize it. Works great with Prime, Hulu, YouTubeTV, etc.. But seriously, this is the worst remote ever. I knew this going in because of friends with newer models. Half the time I just use my phone. The touchy remote and the horrible design so you can't tell up from down is super irritating. I wound up putting painter's tape on the bottom half.
customer_reviews.author: Mike V.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to watch series "The Servant" and have found it is an excellent piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Was an Xmas present for someone, so they could watch the new series only on Apple TV. Found out it can do so much more than it did in years past - so many providers, so many options. The remote, which I love, my wife hates, because it is so hard to get used to. You can use your iPhone as a remote control, but that is a bit tedious. So, a great product, and a great service. Using the 4K version on a 1080P TV (got this in case we replace our TV in the future with a 4K model) and it plays nicely on a 1080P TV. No downscale issues or lag.
customer_reviews.author: notsoNEWKINDLEUSER

customer_reviews.title: Great device, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The Apple TV 4K is a very neat little device. I wish it had an optical audio plug. The remote control for it sucks and it is so small it is very easy to lose. They need to add a feature to allow your iPhone to find it when lost.
customer_reviews.author: George D.

customer_reviews.title: No volume
customer_reviews.text: I had an Apple TV before but decided to upgrade to a 4K. Everything worked with this the Apple TV. The voice recognition worked on the remote. Easy to set up due to prior experience. Except my 4K didn’t play any volume. I already had an Apple TV so I plugged in my old one to see if something happened when I got a new TV. My old Apple TV worked. This one just doesn’t play volume. I hope this doesn’t happen to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Better than Roku
customer_reviews.text: Will always recommend Apple products over any other brand. Ive virtually never experienced any bugs or required repairs on any Apple products. There’s definitely a big improvement of picture quality since my last purchase of Apple TV a handful of years ago. I had a base model roku for my bedroom tv and will say, just spring for this, especially if you have an iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: MariskaGo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful picture and sound.
customer_reviews.text: I have several streaming devices and to tell the truth this one provides the best picture of any of them. I have a 4K tv and it looks great. And now that Apple has opened up to some apps of other providers, this is my go to streaming device. The only thing I would ding it on is the remote. In Apple quest to be streamline, and I’d say minimalistic on the function of there devices, you lose some functionality. It does everything you need it to do, it not always easy doing it. If you want great picture and sound quality then this is the one to use, as long as your okay with the remote.
customer_reviews.author: desertbear

customer_reviews.title: Skip the rest, and invest in this beautiful piece of electronic.
customer_reviews.text: After having purchased other products I really wanted to love, because I appreciate their features, I felt as if I was forcing it, after running into issues I would have been stuck with. I should have invested that money towards the purchase of what I knew was the best bet: Apple TV 4K. It is what I expected, and more. Even the clicker part of it has great features to it via clicking it or gently sliding your finger on it to see more details of a particular show or movie I am watching. I love it, and can't get enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality but the remote ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been a huge Apple fan for the last ten years. I bought the 4K Apple TV to replace my Amazon FireTV. As with all Apple products the setup is as smooth as it gets, the video quality is amazing and beats the FireTV easily. But I returned it because the remote is too complicated to use. The touchpad just sucks, it makes it difficult to navigate in the menu, sometimes you press the touchpad accidentally and end up in a different menu or start a movie you don't want to watch. This is not what I'm expecting from an easy-to-use and intuitive product. The remote takes away all the fun and benefits that come with the AppleTV.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Cabbage

customer_reviews.title: Like old one, but sometimes glitchy.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my prior model AppleTV that worked perfectly, so we could get Disney+. I like the Siri voice control, but this model is glitchy. Have already had to reset system since it switched to another HDMI and began starting my DVD player instead of the AppleTV. But, it works now. Will update review if glitches again.
customer_reviews.author: Skent

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this! I have a firestick on the living room tv but can’t mirror to it so I got the Apple tv for the office tv. I can watch training videos while following along on the computer or cast my laptop screen and use the tv as a larger monitor. Of course, I can take a break and watch tv programs or take it with me to another tv while having all my tv apps and login information retained.
customer_reviews.author: KozmoFrogger

customer_reviews.title: 4K hdr programming at its best!! Remote loses connection frequently..
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly bought the non-4K version at first but quickly returned it for this one... all my programming is now broadcast in 4K HDR! Even my local cable which used to only broadcast at 1080i through my cable box... the remote loses signal/disconnects quite often... but when it does, I just use my phone which works great
customer_reviews.author: Akura2

customer_reviews.title: A Huge Step Up
customer_reviews.text: A huge upgrade from my previous Apple tv box. The menu is completely revamped and you can get more details about your favorite actors and their movies. I was never one to speak into a remote control but this Siri controled device is highly accurate and saves a lot of time.Now that Apple has added Amazon Prime Video to its lineup I can cover all the bases of my video needs. Finally my favorite feature, which has been in all Apple tv boxes is Airplay. I can easily stream my favorite tunes and videos from all my devices. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Very solid, Pretty user interface
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this thing is polished. I bought this to replace our firetv stick that was driving me crazy, I hated the inconsistent UI of Amazon’s TV offerings. How apps would change places or disappear completely having to be searched for, and old apps no longer being used would seemingly stick around forever. Having control over where I place the apps, and the lack of ads compared to the amazon stick is a breath of fresh air. The remote is nice, sometimes I scroll farther than I meant to, but I think there’s a slight learning curve in using it. The screen saver is absolutely gorgeous, the sattelite and drone footage looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: hello goose

customer_reviews.title: A very useful device
customer_reviews.text: I use this device daily. I have quite an assortment of Apple movies and a few TV programs that I use the device to watch. It plugs easily into an HDMI port on my TV and supports 4K. It can be a little sluggish at times and I usually end up restarting the box daily [e.g. it may report that I need to buy a program when I know it is already purchased...a reboot corrects this problem]. The battery on the remote lasts quite a while and the voice commands that I can use with it are very useful for searches, fast forward, rewind, et cetera.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoGene47

customer_reviews.title: Weak product and instructions
customer_reviews.text: This product is total junk. Apple needs to stop trying to dominate every space. As an Apple customer with every device I’m the book I’m ready to make a change. This Apple 4K automatically selected HDR which messed up my tv picture for all other sources. It took phone calls to Samsung and hours to get to the bottom of the issue. This is typical of Apple their insistence on using the music and photos also ends with me losing my music library and 30% of my photos. Apple should start listening to their customers or they will end up being their own downfall.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Does not recognize internet connections
customer_reviews.text: The apple tv started up fine. It would not connect to my wifi network. It said I do not have an internet connection. Called apple support and we tried restarting the modem and router, using an ethernet cable, and a hot spot. Nothing was recognized. After all that, apple support told me they have been plagued with complaints about this problem and there is nothing they can do at this time. They said they will call when the engineers figure out what’s wrong. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan  Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Not convinced with this Apple product 🤨
customer_reviews.text: I just returned one and set up my new one a few days ago. I’ve had to restart it twice. It doesn’t turn off every time and it’s set to sleep after 15 minutes the tv is off. I love Apple products but this one is over priced for what it does. I have a Roku in another room and it works just fine and cost plenty less. I just may return this one. I had an earlier generation that worked fine but I couldn’t stream live tv with it.
customer_reviews.author: the teach

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This apple TV is the best streaming device I've ever had! Picture quality is phenomenal... well worth $200. To get the best picture quality make sure you get a high speed HDMI cable to support the highest quality settings. If this is your first apple device like it was for me... you will have to set up an apple ID online in order to get everything running smoothly. After I did that everything worked properly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Roth

customer_reviews.title: NOT 4K
customer_reviews.text: I legit did comparison of quality on this. It's not 4K. I was broadcasting Narcos (which on Netflix says it's Ultra 4K in the description. I just switched over from the Netflix on this Apple 4K over to the Netflix built into my 4K TV, and the Netflix built into the TV actually broadcast it in true 4K (Beautiful). The Apple 4K fell short of the same quality. If you want a true test go to watch Narcos (You should be able to see the pores on people's faces clearly). Ozark or We, The Marines, are good tests as well.
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love APPLE products. This current iteration of the Apple TV is just another fine example of APPLE quality built into everything they design and bring to market. APPLE is not the first trillion dollar company for no reason, eh? So do yourself a favor if you own a 4K TV or plan too buy one within the next year. Even if you don't have a 4K TV, this product will make your movies and other viewing choices so much better while you are waiting to buy that 4K TV.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Not a big apple fan, but pretty cool. I have a smart tv and for the most part but definently very responsive plenty of uses and simple set up to get streaming or whatever you want to do on it. I'd probably give it a 5 but bought as a gift and only used it for about a month. They spoke very highly of it and had the previous model.
customer_reviews.author: President of the HamSquad

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my birthday and the best yet, no lag time, not clocking, it is so smooth. I had Fire TV for years an i liked it but after Apple TV I could never go back. Love the ability to use my bluetooth, which allows me to do my morning yoga, without waking he house or watch TV late at night or listen to music while having complete silence for the rest of the house. 20 extra dollars for double the memory was a no brainer and I absolutely love the closed captioning!
customer_reviews.author: BookwormMomma

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to stream the Disney app onto the tv and I already had a bunch of Apple products, so I figured this would do the trick. However I am very disappointed in how the interface and remote are. The remote wants to be to futuristic. I prefer something that gives me a majority of the options (fast forward, rewind, pause, etc) without having to learn all the "shortcuts". It also was too sensitive when I was trying to navigate on the screen having to back out and reenter on multiple occasions. It was very frustrating and my tv finally has developed an app for Disney so now I go through that while the apple tv collects dust.
customer_reviews.author: Droof

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade from my older Apple TV. Much faster and buffers better. Easy to navigate around. The one thing I don't like is the remote. The front pad is way too sensitive. It was hard getting used to this remote after using the older remote for so long. The Apple TV control from my iPhone is way better than this remote. Hopefully in the next iteration of this thing, Apple will make improvements on the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Roykirk

customer_reviews.title: I despise the remote
customer_reviews.text: I love the Apple TV itself, it's great. Except...the remote is a POS. It works mostly okay for iTunes/Apple stuff. For all other apps, it's trash. It's overly sensitive sometimes, and other times not sensitive enough. It's inconsistent and always does things I don't want it to do. I wish Apple didn't try to get fancy with this remote. Just give me directional buttons. I understand what they were trying to do, but...try something else. Please.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This is the easiest thing to set up and I am glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying Apple TV and the channels I can get especially Disney+. Everyone should have one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Unresolved issues
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Apple TV over several years. This time I had to return it because of lost functionality and the Apple support. The issue was the slideshow settings and performance. The "settings" option in the slideshow menu is grayed out. I talked two Apple support people, the second one senior support member, but both of them were not able to resolve the issue. The second issue is the the 4K Dolby Vision video setting. If you using slideshow to view your photos the slideshow stops after a couple of photos. If anybody else has a similar problem change the video setting to 1080p Dolby Vision. The 4K Dolby Vision has functionality problems.
customer_reviews.author: George K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is the best digital TV box in my opinion. Apple makes a great product. I am especially glad they recently released Apple Arcade. I hope they get great games with great family values in time and improve their content over indie titles. I love the airplay feature, we use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Nebulon

customer_reviews.title: Great 4K picture quality, easy setup, happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: We finally got a 4K TV, and so I updated our previous-generation Apple TV to this 4K version. Wow! The picture is stunning, and we stream Amazon Prime Video and Netflix frequently. Setup is very easy. Our Amazon Basics HDMI cables, which are 3 or 4 years old, work fine with 4K. I sprung for the 64K version, but we only watch video (no games), so I think I would have been fine with the 32G version.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Meuse

customer_reviews.title: Much better than previous version
customer_reviews.text: This was a good upgrade from my previous version. It’s not perfect but was worth the upgrade from my older version. Some have complained about the remote. I hated it at the beginning but after using it a few days and figuring out how to use it correctly, I’m now okay with it. You can also access the remote from your iPhone or iPad which allows usage of your keyboard when performing searches. Photos, videos, etc taken from your other apple devices can also be displayed onto your TV.
customer_reviews.author: BobP

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had bought another companies product and apple TV beat them. It's very easy to use. I love that you can use voice commands to control what you are watching. The other product you had to go through several menus to get what you wanted. Very Pleased and I'm hoping I can use this over LTE at the cabin in the summer. I just bought another one for another room in the house.
customer_reviews.author: K311y02l4

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I hate this! This is our second Apple TV. I LOVE our original 1st generation Apple TV. It’s easy to use and never freezes or gets stuck. We bought this new one because we had a fire stick for our kids tv and it always froze and was hard for them to use. Unfortunately this new version of the Apple TV is so hard to use! The screen freezes up all the time and it’s so complicated. You have to download apps, it’s confusing and the kids can’t use it at all. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cory.Y

customer_reviews.title: Best tv streaming box, Especially if you use iOS and are in the Apple ecosystem
customer_reviews.text: Best streaming box out there if you’re and ios user. The interface is clean and smooth, faster then a fire stick tv. I own both. You can stream all your photos from your iPhone and mirror your iPhone to your tv, which is very important for me. The only bad thing I can say is the remote is too small and light to be usable without losing it. Id put a case in on the remote and then it’s the perfect streaming device out there. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Niket Lamsal

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely yes
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 4K and 2 older models of Apple TV. I love them. Every tv has to have one. The 4K is the best! Love the remote features especially the volume ability. If you are into movies, like me, this is a solution to cumbersome DVDs. I buy all my movies on iTunes, I have around 860+ movies. I love that I can pick up right where I left off. The 4K has more options for app downloading. Apple TV 4K is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: ariana

customer_reviews.title: Buy 4K hdmi cable with Apple TV
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up however must have a 4K hdmi cable or it will give you problems connecting to the tv. Also read the book on how to use remote can be kind if confusing.
customer_reviews.author: anthony
